item.title: Lessons learned
item.description: Day trading and lessons learned In order to increase fund utilization, today I tried day trading and felt sucks for my operation.

item.title: BTC short trade
item.description: BTC short trade BTC shows weak today and reaches the resistance 10350. I’m not saying the bullish is over, but at leat a short-term pullback may appear.

item.title: BTC long trade
